title: Kitani Mohabbat Hai
overview: Kitani Mohobbat Hai is an Indian soap opera which aired on NDTV Imagine from January 19, 2009 until its end on September 25, 2009. Kitani Mohabbat Hai Season 2 started airing on 1 November 2010. Season 2 is not a continuation; it stars the same leads in a different story.
